TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: This building was burned down, though whether it was intentional or not is inconclusive currently.
HYACINTH: Is that... that looks similar to the Eye of The Universe's signal. Did this species also seek it?
HYACINTH: If the intention was to burn this building down, was it out of hate for the Eye?
HYACINTH: Maybe I should warn the others... If they'd bother hearing me out...
